title: People who flame in ARURF are missing the point of the gamemode.
body:
Like why flame? Odds are not everyone is playing on a champ they've played before. Add the fact that cooldowns are so low that you have no idea what to do sometimes and it's no wonder not everyone who plays is going to play like Faker. ITS 4 FUN. Seriously chill out and take AP {{champion:23}} for a spin! (get it cause he has a spin move teehee).  

Yes. You will get stomped sometimes. But why make it a bad experience? Making losing a good experience by doing the most derpy shit anyone has ever seen. Play with friends. Play by yourself. HELL play WITH yourself. Just don't flame mmmk?{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: people unfortunately flame in ARAM as well. The concept of just having fun in a video game escapes them I think.

See I never play ARAM but ARURF is making me think I should. The games are shorter, more intense (In my opinion), and ultimately just for shits and giggles. Its nice to take a break from the rift to just have fun and mess around.
Unfortunately ARAM is full of tryhards with ARAM accounts. For me at least it's just not fun.

im all for fun.

the only thing im not in for is when someone purposly does nothing but jump into 4 people and suicide claiming "its just urf" or "cant you have fun you tryhard?"


like im playing random champs trying to fuck around but u wont see me just suiciding on purpose.

im going to live and try to still win the game.


losing is never fun.

in any aspect.

i play urf to see which champ i get and how long i can fuck around for before its time to end the game.

i try to win.

nothing to feel pity for im a competitive player thats it.

Everything was fine in the original URF. There was far less complaining about it being stale than how it is now. I never once took URF seriously till they changed it. I always had fun in victory or defeat, then they added this random BS. It's not fun when the enemy team gets the picks that caused the mode to be changed in the first place and you're stuck with someone that does absolutely nothing. 

Have you gotten rammus and had to play against brand/lux/vegiar etc.? It's not fun especially since you have to wait till 20 to FF and the enemy team typically just acts like douches and won't end the game and instead try to spawn kill you. They took what was fun and turned it into an RNG shitfest ruining the game mode.

I found the original URF got pretty stale pretty quick because both teams would often end up picking the top 10 champions in the mode (with a slight variance based on what was banned).

I didn't really want to see Lux again and again and again. And oh man, when ppl found out Hec was crazy good he was either picked or banned each time.
